query:
SELECT s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, q.id as question_id, SUBSTR(q.question, 1, 30) as question_preview
FROM subjects s
LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId
ORDER BY s.id, q.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yp3nD2VtcmPj65.root --database Zt6E6wVVzDENrVcXUKGBHG --execute SELECT s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, q.id as question_id, SUBSTR(q.question, 1, 30) as question_preview
FROM subjects s
LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId
ORDER BY s.id, q.id;

rows.question_preview: 이것은 입력 끊김 현상 테스트입니다. 빠르게 타이핑해도
